A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is normally a franchise about good guys with destined lineages struggling against a monolithic evil. The Last Jedi seems primarily concerned with subverting this expectation. It showcases the failures of its destined archetypes\, muddies a bit of the expected black and white morality\, and asks us to question the value of legends. Where before the saga was about the triumph of goodness\, The Last Jedi is about learning from failure.
